name: CARBOFEN 6060
description: Carbofen 6060 is a powdered, thermoplastic natural resin insoluble in water, soluble in ethanol, and used in foundry coating formulations. Our product is derived from the Parana Pine, a native Brazilian tree of the pine family. This thermoplastic resin is a brown powder insoluble in water. After being saponified by caustic soda (NaOH) or potassium hydroxide (KOH), Carbofen 6060 becomes a soap solution and soluble. Our product is also soluble in ethanol.
